description: Hashtag Bio is a central hub built for social media influencers that are looking to increase their exposure to the public, track and calculate engagement rates. This was my internship project with Social PayMe where I contributed to 33% (287 GitHub commits) of the total changes made to the development repository.
note: Internship project with Social Payme. Source code cannot be revealed due to a signed NDA with the company.

description: This project was awarded the Best Google Cloud Hack 2023 during a Google sponsored hackathon. Fast Tracker is a tool that leverages QR codes to streamline the laborous process of taking attendance by 280% (14 seconds to .5 seconds).
note: If testing out live code, I recommend having two seperate devices. One device to scan the QR code, and another device to generate the QR code. 'test' is the id used for both attendee and volunteer user for demonstration purposes. See video for more information

description: A full-stack web application (MERN) built for the BeachHacks organization that tracks the popularity of events and workshops hosted by the organization. The data was used by the data analysis team to generate a report that will be used to make improvements to future events and workshops
note: Repository has been archived and API endpoints has been removed but front-end is still available.

description: A desktop game built with a team of four indie developers. It's a 2D pixel art game about a sentient sunflower attempting to escape a cursed flowershop!
note: Running the game will have music and sound. Lower the volume if necessary :). Additionally, the game might load for some time and the game can be played in the Itch.io platform by clicking the "See Live" button
